
PROJECT(CRKITExternal)

# Expose TCLAP to the building code.
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(.)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(tclap)

#ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(Utilities)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(ConvertBetweenFileFormats)

# MAKE SURE TO PULL IN THE ITK ZLIB IF WE ARENT BUILDING AGAINST A SYSTEM ZLIB
IF(NOT ITK_USE_SYSTEM_ZLIB)
ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DITKZLIB)
ENDIF(NOT ITK_USE_SYSTEM_ZLIB)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(gifticlib-1.0.9)

#ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(interpolatortest)
